contacts.body: Adding your contacts makes it easy to send and request payments with your friends. Connecting does not send invites to your contacts.

inviteCode.title: Invite Code
inviteCode.body: If you were invited or received a payment, please copy and paste the invite code below.
inviteCode.label: Invite Code
inviteCode.nodeCodeInviteLink: Don’t have an invite code? Request one at <0>celo.org/app</0> or <1>continue without</1>

verificationEducation.title: Confirm
verificationEducation.body:
To make sure your number is really yours, we’re going to send you three messages.

Confirming your number takes about three minutes.

verificationSkipDialog.title: Are you sure?
verificationSkipDialog.body:
Confirming allows you to send and receive funds easily to your phone number.

Unconfirmed accounts can only send payments using Celo addresses or QR codes.

verificationLearnMoreDialog.title: Phone Number Confirmation
verificationLearnMoreDialog.body:
Phone number confirmation works by associating your account with your phone number.

<0>Do I need to complete this?</0>

Confirmation is not required, however, unconfirmed accounts can only send payments using Celo addresses or QR codes.

<1>Security and Privacy</1>

To protect your privacy, only an obfuscated version of your phone number is stored on the Celo blockchain.
